backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko canister actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing a feature-evidence report linking SPA build requirements to involved files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of several frontend files detailing their roles in the Valentine-themed SPA.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining design tokens and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/public/.ic-assets.json5: IC asset canister routing and caching rules for static files and SPA index fallback.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing view states, evasive No button logic, capybara images, and celebration animation.
frontend/src/components/CelebrationBurst: Overlay component rendering animated falling hearts and a Yes confirmation burst.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and maintains an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provider and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles, Valentine palette, aspect-ratio image rules, float animation, evasive button, and celebration overlay styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point configuring react-query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugins such as typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state file describing deployment-related features, pending requests, and metadata for production rollout on the Internet Computer.
